import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, ListGroupItem } from "react-bootstrap"; import Rating from "../components/Rating"; import axios from "axios"; const ProductScreen = () => { c const { id: productId } = useParams(); const product = products.find((p) => p._id === productId); return<> Go Back

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInstock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out Of Stock'} ; }; export default ProductScreen;
